text: Haroina, Mo turo ʙa haq ʙa pajƣamʙari firistodem, to muƶda dihi ʙa cannat kasonero, ki ʙa tu imon ovardand va ʙa farmudai tu amal namudaand va ʙim dihi ʙa duzax kasonero, ki ʙa tu imon naovardaand va az amri tu sarpeci kardaand va hec millate nest, magar ki dar mijonason ʙimdihandae omada ʙud, to huccati Allohro ʙar onho ʙarpo namojad
